blocks.value: The Cherubim are angels of profound wisdom and knowledge. They guard sacred spaces and radiate the light of God's glory and knowledge.

After the Fall, God placed Cherubim with a flaming sword to guard the way to the Tree of Life (Genesis 3:24). In the Temple, golden images of Cherubim adorned the Ark of the Covenant, symbolizing God's throne.
Cherubim protect the divine mysteries and serve as the guardians of God's holiness. They assist in dispensing divine wisdom to those whom God wishes to enlighten.
